title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 259.2 - Compliance with standard code
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 259.2 - Compliance with standard code

State Regulations

All LNG facilities within the State of New York shall, except as otherwise provided in this Part, conform to title 49, Code of Federal

Regulations, part 193, Liquefied Natural Gas Facilities; Federal Safety

Standards (as described in section
10.2
of this

Title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
259.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
